text: A Let's Play, often called an LP, is a recorded video of a video game that includes commentary from the person playing the game. Let's Play videos can be seen on video sharing websites such as YouTube. Many people do Let's Play videos as a series of videos showing a play-through of a video game. == Well- known Let's Players == * PewDiePie * Achievement Hunters * Markiplier * Game Grumps * VanossGaming * TheDiamondMinecart ==References== ==Other websites== *The Let's Play Archive Category:Video game terminology Category:YouTube
title: Let's Play
